entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • directory.getfiles does not take advantage of the index #59126
  • Uncorrect output on my PC on C# language #59125
  • Process.Start doesn't work in . Net5 #59124
  • DataContractSerializer cannot deserialize unknown property containing CDATA when implementing IExtensibleDataObject #59123
  • Loading of XML files fails when using prefix for long paths #59122
  • Different results .Net 5.0 and .Net 6.0 on AES Crypto #59121
  • .Net 5: For Thai, IndexOf(string) returns wrong index for some strings #59120
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string body parameter support #59118
  • IXCLRDataMethodInstance.GetILAddressMap is broken in .NET 6 RC1 #59109
    6.0.0
  • Figure out an alternative to startup hooks for dev-time scenarios such as hot reload #59107
  • X509Certificate2.GetNameInfo(SimpleName) with non-ASCII data on Linux returns oddly encoded results. #59105
    7.0.0
  • Performance regression in JsonSerializer.Deserialize(Stream) for very small types like Int32 #59103
  • Potential performance regression in ConcurrentDictionary #59101
  • [API Proposal]: UriCreationOptions #59099
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR errors during delay load when using crossgen2 in composite mode with method layout #59089
  • Potential performance regression in OrdinalIgnoreCase string comparision #59087
  • SocketException (10060) in HTTP 1.1 stress tests #59086
    7.0.0
  • Hosting .NET Core using nethost and hostfxr - Finding nethost.dll on client machine #59082
    Future
  • System.AccessViolationException in System.Exception.ToString() #59077
    7.0.0
  • Unable to use wrapper types with built-in validation attributes #59076
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #59093
    7.0.0
  • Regression in Utf8ParserTests #59094
    6.0.0
  • JIT not able to inline some simple generic methods marked as AggressiveInline #59075
    Future
  • Test Failure Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\GlobalInstance\\GlobalInstanceMarshallingTestsBuiltInComDisabled\\GlobalInstanceMarshallingTestsBuiltInComDisabled.cmd #59072

Closed

  • Marshal.GetHINSTANCE(module) works on Windows but not on Linux/OSX #59020
    Future
  • `Segmentation fault (core dumped)` at runtime in ARM64 self-contained application #57534
    6.0.0
  • Mono GC crash in CI #58062
    6.0.0
  • [mono/llvm] Outdated attribute name #58998
    6.0.0
  • New rule suggestion: Warn against using Uri as a key #59011
    7.0.0
  • [MacOS] EXC_CRASH (SIGABRT) when GC occurs from within a callback made out of an Dispatch queue: com.apple.root.default-qos thread #58111
    6.0.0
  • HTTP/3 without AppContext switch doesn't give descriptive error #58971
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding Socket Send/ReceiveAsync overloads that elide SocketFlags argument #43934
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58654
    6.0.0
  • ASP.NET Core 5.0 issues with CORS policy for specific origins #59095
  • System.Drawing - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58653
    6.0.0
  • [MemoryCache] Add possibility to disable linked cache entries #45592
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54862
    6.0.0
  • Android + Console.WriteLine + format strings = possible unexpected extra newlines #57304
    7.0.0
  • [System.Net.Http.Json] System.Net.Http.Json - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58750
    6.0.0
  • The actual `ExceptBy` and `IntersectBy` APIs differ from the approved APIs #58756
  • Global Mutex #55169
    Future
  • Backport `UseConsoleLifetime()` fix from net6 to net5. #59014
  • Very sluggish VS 2019 and VS 2022 performance starting with DotNet 6 Preview 5 related to Source Generators #56702
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into feature/use-dllimport-generator #59119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59116
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Bump intellisense version to RC1 (main) #59115
    documentation, * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59114
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #59113
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #59112
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [Tell-mode][release/6.0] Use arcade power source build infra #59108
  • [WIP] Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59106
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove exception messages from resource strings #59104
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Update the branding to GA #59102
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Emit diagnostics & exceptions for sourcegen handling init-only properties & JsonInclude attributes #59097
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods #59096
    area-System.Drawing
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59091
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59090
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [release/6.0] Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #59088
    area-System.Console
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.11 and v4.0 (#58446) #59074
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Remove benign assert #59044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Update DllImportGenerator to the latest version #59117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Fix EventPipe sample profiler resolution on Windows. #59056
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59007
    runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Eliminate PROJECTK_BUILD from RF #59057
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Update attribute name used for controlling frame pointer elimination #59069
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #59045
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Elide SocketFlags in Socket API #57634
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WASM] Enabled strict mode on all JS files #54011
    arch-wasm
  • [release/5.0] Add Fedora 36 RID #57703
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #59047
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Change PKCS12 password to assist with credscan #59080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Extend MemoryCacheOptions with TrackLinkedCacheEntries #57648
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Fix broken API proposal template link #59083
    area-Meta
  • Add missing docs to System.Text.Json #59053
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json
  • Add missing System.Linq API docs #59038
    documentation, area-System.Linq
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • UpdateJson and CompilerServices.Unsafe versions #59067
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58905
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58895
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #59024
    area-System.Runtime, os-ios
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging

Updated

  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #56865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove duplicates from the AOT data blob. #58982
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Optimize thread state transition #58992
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: simple VN budget stress mode #59051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • Runtime changes for DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer #59062
    area-System.Runtime
  • Allow users passing FILE_FLAG_BACKUP_SEMANTICS as FileOptions #58854
    area-System.IO
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix SendAsync from inpersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
    area-Build-mono
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Share init-compiler with arcade #59018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu + mac #58987
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59029
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use SROA-friendly struct type declarations #59060
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 6.0.0
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Remove SupportedOSPlatforms windows on Hosting WindowsServices #59064
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • fixed some deep recursion related bugs #1554

Merged

  • update-feeds #1555
    area-DllImportGenerator
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge NativeAOT #1553
  • Compile S.I.C.Native with CFG #1548

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Net6 - RC1] JsonSerializerContext Breaking Change? #20999
  • MSBuild error for dotnet build with --self-contained #20992

Closed

  • [6.0 RC1] F5 debugging ASP.NET Core broken in Visual Studio due to HTTP 404 #20444
  • `dotnet watch test` doesn't pass through args to the `dotnet test` #20974

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #20998
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.1xx #20997
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #20996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #20995
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • Allow specifying url for workload rollback #20991
    Area-Workloads
  • Only throw missing reference path error when running with references #20990
    Area-Compatibility
  • [Backport] [Blazor] Allow duplicates in resolved files to publish (#20961) #20988
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Warn when using .NET 6 with 16.11 #20987
    Area-NetSDK
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController dependency #20984
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #20979
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Only throw missing reference path error when running with references #20972
    Area-Compatibility
  • [Blazor] Improves dotnet.js detection on ComputeBlazorPublishAssets #20980
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Hide unused workload verbosity options #20983
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Revert rc1 branch back to rc1 tooling versions #20986
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Allow duplicates in resolved files to publish #20961
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build reference #20971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20793
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #20959
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix EnableTrimAnalyzer for TFMs < 6.0 #20937
    Area-ILLink
  • remove unused env var: `DOTNET_SKIP_FIRST_TIME_EXPERIENCE` #20955
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore

Closed

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SmartBreakLineWithTabTabCompletion2 is flaky #56394
  • Improve diagnostic for conversion of lambda expression to base type with `-langversion:9` and earlier #56391
  • RegisterImplementationSourceOutput should work with partial methods #56390
  • Improve the clarity of CS1660 - "cannot convert [...] to 'T' because it is not a delegate type" #56386
  • Generating overrides from C# to VB include broken <Nullable> attributes #56384
  • Duplicated CS0246 error messgaes #56380
  • Performance: faster switch over string objects #56374
    Compiler.Next
  • Maybe a bug: Inner InvalidProgramException when dealing with `dynamic` and .ToList() #56372
    17.0

Closed

  • CSharpGenerateVariableCodeFixProvider crashed with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #53686
    17.1
  • Compiler emits unnecessary stores for conditional interpolated string handlers #54704
    17.0
  • Stack Overflow in src\Workspaces\Core\Portable\Workspace\Solution\SolutionState.CompilationTracker.cs #56356
  • Missing definite assignment error for complex "is" checks #56298
    17.0
  • Roslyn should have an ETW/EventPipe source that we can use to report data #54770
    17.0
  • Cannot infer delegate type for lambda expression with implicit and explicit `return` statements #55320
    17.0
  • Cannot convert lambda expression to `LambdaExpression` #56033
    17.0
  • Types of fields declared in tuples are bound before the fields are cached in _lazyDeclaredMembersAndInitializers #51204
    17.0
  • Quick using ABI namespace change not backported #55515
    17.1
  • String interpolation produces incorrect output for concatenated strings #55569
    17.0
  • AutomationObject doesn't handle BinaryOperatorSpacingOptions correctly #53104
    17.1
  • First-chance NativeIntegerTypeDecoder+ErrorTypeException in semantic classifier/binder #49823
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't offer to generate parameters in lambdas #56397
    Area-IDE
  • Verify xmldoc for cref to positional property #56396
    Test, New Language Feature - Records
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers
  • Add test to cover pointer to unmanaged T pattern matching #56393
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1362115 #56392
    auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1361888 #56388
    auto-merge
  • Add service for all functions related to FileBanners today in SyntaxFacts #56387
    Area-IDE
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE
  • Update UnitTesting Hot Reload API to consider syntax errors #56379
    Area-IDE
  • Handle interaction of VB with Static Abstract Members in interfaces #56375
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Fix merge if in top level statements #56373
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56364
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Next
  • Force tpl antecedent work to run asynchronously to prevent stack overflows #56383
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix equals operator with split state on right #56321
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56381
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Infer delegate type from lambda expression with explicit return statements without expressions #56236
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Update P4 packages #56366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add missing using directive #56378
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Introduce Parameter Priority #56359
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56368
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56363
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't restrict allowed values #56365
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove ErrorTypeException from native int decoder #56350
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Delete remaining bits of IWaitIndicator #56355
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor code to simpler implementation using `_pool.ToListAndFree(..)` #56277
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Inline diagnostics and intellicode cohesion #55095
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Errors
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Follow syntaxfacts pattern #56351
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run -p:Configuration=Release` looks for assets in `bin/Debug` #36521
    6.0-rc2
  • ARM64 support in AspNetCoreModuleV2 #36519
  • High CPU usage with dotnet watch on an F# project #36514
  • Build VS redist package for ANCM #36513
  • Add `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` string query parameter support #36511
  • Impossible to compile a project targeting net6.0-windows when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing 6.0.0-rc.1.* #36510
  • Kestrel rejects requests with non standard ASCII characters #36509
  • Support Pointer Events in Blazor #36508
  • [Blazor .Net 6 RC1] PreRender: Has ComponentApplicationState been renamed/changed namespace? #36507
  • Route handlers throw System.Text.Json.JsonReader exception for requests with invalid JSON body rather than returning 422 #36499
    6.0-rc2
  • VS Code: Type "@DateTime" in the _layout.cshtml , the color of this symbol is incorrect. #36495
  • [Blazor-wasm] Continuation of: Lazy loading of application areas #5465 #36493

Closed

  • dotnet-openapi refresh does not truncate json documents. #35767
  • Publish Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements #36454
    6.0.0
  • "DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement" is not respecting "AuthorizationOptions.InvokeHandlersAfterFailure" #35610
    Discussions
  • Error using a generated razor class in any other class #36265
    6.0.0
  • Use Roslyn C# Formatting Service Directly #33951
    17.0-Preview5
  • Mac: dotnet dev-certs https --trust does not explain how to undo this #4102
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup regression: json #36294
  • HTTP/3: Document Kestrel requirements #34488
    6.0-rc2
  • Avoid Creating AuthenticationHeaderValue #36506
  • Find if session is expired with HttpContext #36090
    Discussions
  • Fix minimal APIs behavior with duplicate endpoint and route names #35436
    6.0-rc2
  • 404 page with FallbackPolicy #35922
    Discussions
  • There is no `Retry` button in the page after reconnection to the server for blazor server project #32545
    6.0-rc2
  • Razor component doesn't render anymore after hot reload first try #36393
  • blazor _httpContextAccessor.HttpContext null #36498
  • Test issue for Blazor stuff please ignore #36502
  • .NET 6.0 ASP.NET MVC DataAnnotations #36437
  • Uncaught pause_on_uncaught #36497
  • SupplyParameterFromQueryAttribute is long-winded and verbose #36494
  • How to pass a ComponentApplicationState to a component under test with bUnit? #35928
    6.0.0
  • [Question/Bug] EmptyBodyBehavior.Allow behavior #36466

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert setting endpoint name automatically #36518
    area-web-frameworks
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #36517
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #36516
  • Avoid using TargetFramework in build targets #36512
    area-mvc
  • Add support for BindAsync without ParameterInfo #36505
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve documentation #36496
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update http3 RequiresPreviewFeatures attributes with message/URL #36491
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Make DelegateEndpointConventionBuilder constructors public #36492
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Identity UI fix razor content #36479
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • Clarify InvokeHandlersAfterFailure #36501
    area-security, 7.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

    6.0.0

Updated

    6.0.0
  • dotnet tools shouldn't error if no arguments are provided #510
    7.0.0

Merged

    dotnet-counters, 6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to reference the application window to set properties like height/width/etc? (.NET MAUI Blazor) #2487
  • [Bug] [iOS] Contents in RefreshView don't expand to full width and height, set to -1. #2485
  • [Bug] Workload installation failed #2483
  • [Bug] AddHostObjectToScript does not work in MAUI Renderer #2481
  • [Bug] FlyoutBehavior in WinUI shows duplicated hambruger and crash #2475
  • [Bug] MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync() issue in OnePlus Pro physical device #2474
  • Update AzDO build agents to have VS2022 #2473

Closed

  • [Bug] IsVisible Can't Be Changed at Runtime #1416
  • [Bug] initially invisible views don't work as expected #1293
  • [Bug] BoxView and Button don't change their size when the HeightRequest property is changed #1549
  • [Bug] ContentPage Padding doesn't work #1289
  • [Bug] Updating "ColumnSpacing" or "RowSpacing" in Grid does not update spacing. #2325
    6.0.100-rc.2
  • [Bug] [Android] Grid does not size correctly until a few moments after initial render #1992
  • [Bug] Investigate how the BackgroundLayers are all directly tied to the NativeArrange calls inside ViewHandler #1282

PullRequests

Created

  • Return Size.Zero from measure when ScrollView Content is null #2486
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
  • Remove dotnet core build update #2482
  • Remove Local Property #2479

Merged

  • Make VC Public on PageHandler so it's replaceable #2460
  • Make factory fall back to CreateNativeView #2471

Updated

  • Border control #2445
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431
  • Android TabbedPageHandler #2432
  • [workload] create $(MauiVersion) property #2282
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Minimal changes required to support RemoteWebView #2469
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential change-tracking bug for many-to-many #26023
  • EF Core 6 RC1 breaks extensions due to a change in a contract #26022
  • how to replace SqlServer SqlServerUpdateSqlGenerator with my own custom implementation? #26019
  • Test that provider convention sets replace all instances of a given convention #26017
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnectionPool.GetConnection() fails with "Inconceivable!" on local test run #26016
    6.0.0
  • Incorrect error message if the name of a not-mapped property in principal is same as the inverse property name in child. #26015
    MQ
  • Migrations/Temporal Tables: null value exception when executing Down migration to convert entity from temporal to normal #26014
    6.0.0

Closed

  • [EFC5] Sharing the same .NET type among multiple owned types loses EntityState.Deleted tracking in ChangeTracker #23418
    6.0.0
  • SQL Server: cannot add value-converted timestamp column #25997
    6.0.0-rc2
  • IsRowVersion and HasConversion<byte[]> produce incorrect migration #22980
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Join with group by throwing exception #26028
  • Bundle does not add startup project and failes with FileNotFoundException when running bundle with `--startup-project` #25625
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query: null semantics should keep track of columns that are guaranteed to be null and remove redundant IS NULL/ IS NOT NULL checks #19883
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query/InMemory: NRE for spatial method with null arguments #19664
    6.0.0-rc2
  • LINQ/SQLITE: Unnecessary IS NULL term generated for linq clause !string.isnullorempty() #19410
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Insert: using a key-column with datatype: datetime2(3) fails - datetime2(7) works #16295
    6.0.0-rc2
  • QuerySplittingBehavior warning #26018
  • Migrations Bundle needs help finding SQLIte on MacOS #25483
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Create period columns as hidden #25841
    6.0.0-rc2
  • EFCore.SqlServer - v6.00-preview - SqlServerDatabaseModelFactory doesn't read information about hidden temoral tables' columns #25774
    6.0.0-rc2
  • EFCore.SqlServer - v6.00-preview - failed on creating model for WideWorldImporters sample database temporal tables #25773
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Improve exception for many-to-many self reference #24773
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Query: Bugs in converting an Apply to a Join #24474
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Migration from LinQ2SQL: Query returns values with LinQ but does not using EFCore #22981
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Strange sql translation of a level 2 projections #21665
    6.0.0-rc2
  • ArgumentNullException with InMemory database when initializing new DTO in projection #19726
    6.0.0-rc2
  • 3.1, Regression, InMemoryDatabase: 'Nullable object must have a value.' #19425
    6.0.0-rc2
  • SharedTypeQueryRelationalTestBase does not delimit identifiers in raw SQL #25661
  • Bundle build error `NETSDK1045` with incorrect SDK when the .NET SDK is fixed with global.json #25622
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable`1[System.Boolean]' cannot be used for return type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[System.Object]' #25958
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly 'netstandard, Version=2.1.0.0' #25885
  • Scaffolding naming problem in .Net 5 #25988
  • Improve exception message when configuring an owned entity type as non-owned #25863
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Sqlite: Deleting a database previously referenced by a different connection string throws #25797
    6.0.0-rc2
  • FK properties with default values aren't always marked as store-generated #23974
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Link conceptual documentation from API docs #17508
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26033
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26032
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26026
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [TINY] Fix to #26014 - Migrations/Temporal Tables: null value exception when executing Down migration to convert entity from temporal to normal #26021

Merged

  • List shared-identity entries for STETs #26027
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #26031
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #26030
  • Update to .NET SDK 6.0 RC1 #26025
  • Tools: Pass absolute project paths to ef.exe #26024
  • Fix adding value-converted rowversion column #25998
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25999
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #19883 - Query: null semantics should keep track of columns that are guaranteed to be null and remove redundant IS NULL/ IS NOT NULL checks #25951
  • Remove OSX from helix build (temporarily) #26020
  • Fixing bugs around hidden period columns #26013
  • Query: Extract join predicate from Having for group by aggregate queries #26011
  • Query: Translate object.Equals correctly when object argument passed … #26010
  • Query: Add regression test for #21665 #26009
  • Query: Avoid incorrect cast when simplifying null check #26004
  • Bundles: Copy NuGet.Config and global.json files #26005
  • Query: Add regression test for #19726 #26002
  • Throw better exception for many-to-many with same navigation on both ends #25990
  • Don't hard-code value generation to Never for FKs #25992
  • Clear all connection pools before attempting to delete SQLite file #25985
  • Better exception message when switching from owned to non-owned configuration #25984
  • Finish linking to conceptual docs #25983

Updated

  • Allow UseTransaction to replace existing transaction #25979
